Articles.Content:
> 
> Zamo slow down he's already done two for you, wait a while before asking for another ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Hey we are all waiting for a good render here ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif). I'm just asking for pics before it get's crowded in here. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Sure thing Starwhip, The first one is my favorite angle.

- - - Updated - - -

**I REALLY LOVE EAGLE-1 and VULTURE NOVA! GOD! I WISH I COULD GIVE YOU MORE REP!** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
May I ask if you can render kerbals in the rover seats?

> 
> May I ask if you can render kerbals in the rover seats?

**I was about to ask the same question.**

Hey looks like you have a plane collection, check out mine complete with bombs and all tell me what you think. 

**Rocket Planes**

My new Fighter-Bomber Rocket Plane, composed of three engines, the third engine at the bottom can be fired as a missile-torpedo either guided or unguided but still accurate, yes she is maneuverable and fun to play with. Can only be landed vertically or with parachutes and deliver an **(ALCM) Air Launched Cruise Missile**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/XBPsJ)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/R2idI)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/g9DRZ)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/4f3oz)

Another version of the rocket plane but much more agile and has bombs. Comes in different fuel capacities for short, medium and long range missions. (With decreasing maneuverability of course because of fuel weight, just look at the difference between the fuel tanks) 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/5SK6N)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-26T01:37:11Z" title="02/26/2015 01:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 26, 2015</time> by Zamovinar**

> 
> May I ask if you can render kerbals in the rover seats?

Erm... no, I don't have a model of a kerbal. Though if you can find one, I certainly can!

**Starwhip** I really like how the wheels turned out on front of my tank they look badass, are the tanks done yet? or are you still working on something?

(Another question do you know Kerbal Powers? or Kerbal Evolution, has zekes invited you?)

> 
> Erm... no, I don't have a model of a kerbal. Though if you can find one, I certainly can!

So how would you render the following fighter?

 ![0E6B275669411FFFF801513DEBA8DE9C770DC30F](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/26230963996310384/0E6B275669411FFFF801513DEBA8DE9C770DC30F/)

And, if it possible to do so while still looking nice, can you? (Though I do have to get the download set up first)

Also, Zamovinar, your imgur albums are not working for me.

> 
> So how would you render the following fighter?
>  [http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/26230963996310384/0E6B275669411FFFF801513DEBA8DE9C770DC30F/](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/26230963996310384/0E6B275669411FFFF801513DEBA8DE9C770DC30F/)

I'd tilt it in such a way that you couldn't see the seats... Probably a back-left shot of a bank.

Zamovinar, I'm working on it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I'd tilt it in such a way that you couldn't see the seats... Probably a back-left shot of a bank.
> Zamovinar, I'm working on it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You could just tint the cockpit in gimp ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I know how to do that

> 
> You could just tint the cockpit in gimp ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I know how to do that

So do I, look at all of the engine heat effects. Those were done in Gimp. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/jt30syme2m2xlo5/NAFA-5-C1%20Wailing%20Banshee.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jt30syme2m2xlo5/NAFA-5-C1%20Wailing%20Banshee.craft?dl=0)

 So can you render that aircraft (BTW, can you please remove the capsules attached to thee sides of the aircraft cockpit?)

Zamonivar, I've redone the render as per request: 1366 x 768, and at your angle.

![2kggzX6.png](http://i.imgur.com/2kggzX6.png)

Next in the queue is noname117.

Hey, starwhip maybe you'll have better luck then me on [this](http://www./download/581aaphsnpnbkb2/TSP-VV2.craft)craft.

For some reason the jet engine won't render. Could you take a look at it and maybe so some of your fancy-smanchy arty stuff to it?

> 
> Zamonivar, I've redone the render as per request: 1366 x 768, and at your angle.
> [http://i.imgur.com/2kggzX6.png](http://i.imgur.com/2kggzX6.png)
> 
> Next in the queue is noname117.

Goodness Gracious! I think I have tears in my eyes ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif) I'm so Happy (tears of happiness)

I love that!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> So how would you render the following fighter?
>  [http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/26230963996310384/0E6B275669411FFFF801513DEBA8DE9C770DC30F/](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/26230963996310384/0E6B275669411FFFF801513DEBA8DE9C770DC30F/)
> 
> And, if it possible to do so while still looking nice, can you? (Though I do have to get the download set up first)
> 
> Also, Zamovinar, your imgur albums are not working for me.

I have updated my post

I probably should have specified an angle and a render quality for the picture, but I don't really care that much. Just make sure it looks good, that's really all I have to say about that. Though if you can get a view with the cockpit, go for it (I love that cockpit)

And Zamovinar, your planes look pretty nice, though I would be a bit worried about fuel consumption and pilot safety with them. Also, with cluster bombs, you can in fact create a delay by mounting the bomblets on a probe core and having retrograde firing seperatrons destroy that probe core. Looks much more realistic

> 
> I probably should have specified an angle and a render quality for the picture, but I don't really care that much. Just make sure it looks good, that's really all I have to say about that. Though if you can get a view with the cockpit, go for it (I love that cockpit)
> And Zamovinar, your planes look pretty nice, though I would be a bit worried about fuel consumption and pilot safety with them. Also, with cluster bombs, you can in fact create a delay by mounting the bomblets on a probe core and having retrograde firing seperatrons destroy that probe core. Looks much more realistic

Yeah fuel consumption is an issue but not safety. I like the way you think, **I have done that probecore time delay technique already for my previous cluster bombs**. I've tried it already on this **glitch scatter bomb** I made.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Mi351)

 I prefer instant deployment for my planes now for simplicity.

I really like the cockpit design on one of your planes ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I might copy that.
These look great! How do you make them? I think I saw something about exporting .craft's into Blender, do you use that?

Very nice renders! I've got a fire/smoke node setup for Cycles if you want it, adapted from some videos obviously. I've also experimented with using smoke as displacement, so just tell me if you're interested and I'll render something quick.

I updated this for .90 This is pre .90, but at the time of its development a year ago, it was the smallest such SSTO ever developed at the time. It lead to the creation of Shuttlecraft Systems Inc. and inspired dozens of small SSTO VTOLs. I've always wanted a 3d print of it. I suppose I'd like a render of it too. I have the computer to do it. Just not the time. I'll post a craft file shortly if interested. Dubbed the Telsa Roadster of the skies, the SSI Ion:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/sCJNW)

The NAFA-5-C1 Wailing Banshee render is taking longer than normal, because it imported oddly. Several parts are out of whack, and I need to reposition/rescale them.

After I get it done (Probably tonight, though the render may be posted tomorrow because of personal stuff), next is Briansun's TSP-VV2. Then there's a free slot, inigma, if you want the SSI Ion, I'll do it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(Oh, shoot, forgot about the STS-4 render... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) Do you want that one done first?)

> 
> May I ask if you can render kerbals in the rover seats?

Hey, I'm the maker of the script that Starwhip is using to make all of these (awesome) renders. Hopefully this weekend I'll finish the Kerbal I'm making, and then share that with everyone.

![jeb6.png](https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/54e543506e0c82934e650529/1920x1080/735cc1d2f6965f7430921a6b740de183/jeb6.png)

> 
> Hey, I'm the maker of the script that Starwhip is using to make all of these (awesome) renders. Hopefully this weekend I'll finish the Kerbal I'm making, and then share that with everyone.
> [https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/54e543506e0c82934e650529/1920x1080/735cc1d2f6965f7430921a6b740de183/jeb6.png](https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/54e543506e0c82934e650529/1920x1080/735cc1d2f6965f7430921a6b740de183/jeb6.png)

We've all been waiting for this. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Of course I need to know just where I'm supposed to send my first born in payment for this.......haha.

Kidding of course but wanted to say thanks for all the hard work!! I'm having way to much fun with that script. I'm horrible at doing organics so this model is a pleasant surprise.

The pilot wings are an awesome touch!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T18:52:19Z" title="02/27/2015 06:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by esinohio**

> 
> Hey, I'm the maker of the script that Starwhip is using to make all of these (awesome) renders. Hopefully this weekend I'll finish the Kerbal I'm making, and then share that with everyone.

That's looking pretty nice and will allow good renders for external seat craft! Good work!

I saw that. I wish I could put my render there.
